paragraphs.text:
%md
### Demo of data management and visualization using ORAAH
#### Several interfaces available from within ORAAH's R APIs demonstrate the ability to load, exchange and visualize data:
- R Data Frame
- Apache HIVE
- Apache IMPALA
- Hadoop HDFS
- Spark DataFrame
- Oracle Database
 
Copyright (c) 2020 Oracle Corporation                              
###### [The Universal Permissive License (UPL), Version 1.0](https://oss.oracle.com/licenses/upl/)
---

msg.data:
Demo of data management and visualization using ORAAH

Several interfaces available from within ORAAH’s R APIs demonstrate the ability to load, exchange and visualize data:

  • R Data Frame
  • Apache HIVE
  • Apache IMPALA
  • Hadoop HDFS
  • Spark DataFrame
  • Oracle Database

Copyright (c) 2020 Oracle Corporation

The Universal Permissive License (UPL), Version 1.0

paragraphs.title: Load the ORAAH libraries
paragraphs.text:
%r
library(ORCH)

paragraphs.title: Graphical output from an R dataframe
paragraphs.text:
%r 

# The zshow() Function on R Dataframe input is loads a Random Sample of N records to present them to Zeppelin's interface
z.show(iris)

paragraphs.title: Connect to HIVE from R via ORAAH, and push data to HIVE
paragraphs.text:
%r

# Connect to HIVE on the "HIVE Server 2" node of the cluster (cfclbv3873)
ore.connect(type='HIVE',host='cfclbv3873',user='oracle', all=TRUE )

# Drop the HIVE table if it exists
if (ore.exists('iris_hive')) ore.drop(table='iris_hive') 

# Push the R dataframe iris to HIVE
ore.create(iris,table='iris_hive')

# Check the names of the tables available in HIVE
ore.ls()

paragraphs.title: Native HIVE connection from Zeppelin JDBC to compare
paragraphs.text:
%hive

-- Show all HIVE tables available for the default database
show tables

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: Connect to IMPALA from R via ORAAH
paragraphs.text:
%r
# Connect to IMPALA Daemon service on the Impala Deamon (cfclbv3873)
# Will automatically disconnect from HIVE. IMPALA shares the HIVE Metadata Store
ore.connect(type='IMPALA',host='cfclbv3873',user='oracle', all=TRUE )

# Drop the IMPALA table if it exists
if (ore.exists('iris_impala')) ore.drop(table='iris_impala') 

# Push the R dataframe iris to IMPALA
ore.create(iris,table='iris_impala')

# Check the names of the tables available in IMPALA
ore.ls()

paragraphs.title: Native IMPALA connection from Zeppelin JDBC to compare
paragraphs.text:
%impala
show tables

paragraphs.title: Graphical output from an R dataframe
paragraphs.text:
%md
## --------- HADOOP HDFS FILE ---------

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: Graphical Output straight from an HDFS file
paragraphs.text:
%r 
# Push the R dataframe iris from memory to a Temporary HDFS, mapped as an ORAAH DFS ID
iris_hdfs <- hdfs.put(iris)

# Graph the result from the DFS ID
# The zepShow() Function on HDFS input is running a Top N records
z.show(iris_hdfs)

paragraphs.title: Graphical output from an R dataframe
paragraphs.text:
%md
## --------- SPARK DATAFRAME ---------

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: Connect to Spark and create a Context for ORAAH
paragraphs.text:
%r 
# Use default values of 2 instances, with 2 cores and 2 GB of RAM per instance
# Disconnect first just in case
if (spark.connected()) spark.disconnect()
# Create a basis Spark Session in YARN, also passing the Oracle DB JDBC driver
spark.connect('yarn', spark.yarn.dist.jars='/opt/oracle/od4h/jlib/ojdbc8.jar')

msg.data:
Info: active HDFS namenode is cfclbv3870.us2.oraclecloud.com
Info: loaded configuration from 'spark-default.conf'
Info: memory is set to 2G
Info: spark.executor.instances is set to 2
Info: spark.executor.cores is set to 2

paragraphs.title: Push the HDFS data to a Spark DF
paragraphs.text:
%r 
### Create a Spark DataFrame from the CSV file stored in HDFS
iris_df <- orch.df.fromCSV(csvPath = iris_hdfs,verbose = FALSE)

msg.data:
Warning: Spark data frame column names changed to keep them Spark SQL compliant
Warning: 'Sepal.Length' changed to 'Sepal_Length'
Warning: 'Sepal.Width' changed to 'Sepal_Width'
Warning: 'Petal.Length' changed to 'Petal_Length'
Warning: 'Petal.Width' changed to 'Petal_Width'

paragraphs.title: ORAAH Output from a Spark DataFrame in R
paragraphs.text:
%r # The zshow() function on a Spark DF input runs a Random Sample of N records (1,000 by default)
z.show(iris_df)

paragraphs.title: Graphical output from an R dataframe
paragraphs.text:
%md
## --------- ORACLE DATABASE ---------

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: Check that the table IRIS_DB is available in Oracle Database
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc
select tablespace_name, user, table_name from user_tables where table_name='IRIS_DB'

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

msg.data:
TABLESPACE_NAME	USER	TABLE_NAME
USERS	RQUSER	IRIS_DB

paragraphs.title: Load the Oracle Database table into ORAAH's Spark Session
paragraphs.text:
%r
# Read the DB Settings to be used
source ('/home/oracle/R_scripts/DB_Settings.R')
# Load the table "IRIS_DB" from the Oracle Database into a Spark DataFrame
iris_from_DB <- orch.jdbc(driverClass = "oracle.jdbc.OracleDriver",
                           url = url_db, 
                           user = user_db,
                           password = pass_db, 
                           table= "IRIS_DB",
                           classpath = "/opt/oracle/od4h/jlib/ojdbc8.jar")

# Load data from DB via ORAAH's JDBC into memory as a Spark DF
iris_db <- ORCHcore:::.ora.df.fromJDBC(iris_from_DB)

# Optional: Cache the Spark DataFrame
# orch.df.persist(cust_fromDB_sparkDF, storageLevel = "MEMORY_ONLY")

paragraphs.title: ORAAH Output from a Spark Data Frame generated directly from the Oracle Database table via JDBC
paragraphs.text:
%r # The zshow() function from a Spark DF input runs a Random Sample of N records (1,000 records by default)
z.show(iris_db)

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.text:
%r # Cleanup and disconnect from Spark and HIVE/IMPALA
spark.disconnect()
ore.disconnect()

paragraphs.title: Appendix: zshow() function

paragraphs.text: %r
